p: Several studies suggest that enterovirus 3A plays a critical role on the formation of replication organelles 15 16 17. It is generally believed that 3A promotes assembly of the RNA replication complex through its interaction with ARF1 or GBF1. For example, the 3A protein of poliovirus (PV) and coxsackievirus B3 (CVB3) interact with the large guanine nucleotide exchange factor GBF1 18 19 20 21. However, the 3A-GBF1 interaction does not seem to correlate with RNA replication 22 23 24. This suggests that additional factors may participate in picornavirus RNA replication. Nonetheless, the host cellular partners needed for EV71 replication are unclear.
